mapper.select: select product_code from cart where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from cart where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and product.product_type = #{productType}
select quantity from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and product.product_code = #{productCode}
select cart.quantity from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and product.product_type = #{productType}

select cart.*, product.product_name, product.product_unit, product.product_price, product.product_file, product.product_sold_out, product.product_type from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId};

select cart.*, product.product_name, product.product_unit, product.product_price, product.product_file, product.product_sold_out, product.product_type from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and cart.product_code = #{productCode};
select sum(cart.quantity * product.product_price) from cart inner join product on cart.product_code = product.product_code where cart.member_id = #{memberId} and not product.product_sold_out = 1;
mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_id = #{memberId} and product_code = #{productCode}
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where member_id = #{memberId} and product_code = #{productCode}
